name: Moon Thief
description:
The moon has disappeared from the sky and you are the only one who can restore it. Climb high into the night sky and find the button that will bring back the moon!

Controls:

Right - [D] or arrow key

Jump - [K] or [X]

Action - [J] or [Z]

This game was made for Nokia 3310 Jam 3 using the Efforts Pro font and some sounds from the provided resources.
